bugs.summary: Don't use D2D when willReadFrequently is set
Allow willReadFrequently to control whether DrawTargetWebgl is created
pinch zoom on non-pinch zoomable page often leads to unintended fast fling
browser_device_controls_menus.js keeps vsync enabled forever (on Windows 7)
Perma [tier 2] sys-symbols permafails with Unsuccessful task run with exit code: X completed in xx.xx seconds
